EmailTemplate.description: Notifies user that Proposal Review has been Rejected
EmailTemplate.name: ANZ Proposal Review Rejection Notification - English only
EmailTemplate.subject: Notifies GNG user that GNG has been Rejected (US)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.ANZ_Approver__c} has rejected the Proposal Review decision for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c}. Click here to review the 'Proposal Review' (Why Go) record: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link} and any rejection comments.
